string.text: Pay attention to anyone in a gunfight or surrounded by mutants.
Iï¿½ve got no work for you....

I lost my friend last week to a Vortex. Everything was quiet, we were travelling back to camp and suddenly he just lifted into the air and started to spin. It tore him up till there was nothing left. I can't stop thinking about him. What if I'd grabbed his hand? It just goes to show, you should always throw bolts.
Sorry man, I'm too tired. I need to get some rest.
I don't have anything else for you. Sorry man.
Nothing. Trying to make it, that's all.
Well I'm not really up to date with all the latest news.

I'm stuck here, alright? Stuck. I want to go home and they're not letting me. That's all the news. The guys that walk deep into the Zone, the ones that have been around, they say different things. And at times they bring goodies too, enough to make you jealous. They say there are places like mounds of gold: artefacts all for the taking. Granted not many will get there, and even less will make it back with the loot.

Did you hear the rumour that the Zone is growing? I think it's true: I saw this frightening humanoid mutant right by the perimeter. Previously you could only run into these freakish things in the centre of the Zone. Things aren't looking good.
